# [Interview #977: Cosmere Q&A - 17th Shard, Entry #165](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=977#165)

#### E. Hyde

Shinovar seems more earthlike than the rest of Roshar; does this occur naturally or was it somehow changed to be that way?

#### Brandon Sanderosn

RAFO
